Package org.camunda.bpm.engine.impl.form.engine

Class HtmlElementWriter

java.lang.Object
org.camunda.bpm.engine.impl.form.engine.HtmlElementWriter
public class HtmlElementWriter extends Object

Simple writer for html elements. Used by the HtmlDocumentBuilder.

Author:
Daniel Meyer

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Map<String,String>
    attributes
     
    protected boolean
    isSelfClosing
    selfClosing means that the element should not be rendered as a start + end tag pair but as a single tag using "/" to close the tag inline
